column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Coming from NY
column2: I often go to Ippudo for the best authentic ramen. But now I can honestly say the Spicy Chicken ramen here at JINYA is the best ramen I've ever had. The broth is SO flavorful
column4: and the chicken is tender and absolutely delicious. The portion was also very generous
column5: my brother and I could barely finish our bowls. I wish I lived in Houston so I could come here all the time!
